pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sentiment Analysis for Text and Qualitative Data // Implements sentiment analysis using huggingface https://huggingface.co transformer zero-shot classification model pipelines. The default pipeline is Cross-Encoder's DistilRoBERTa https://huggingface.co/cross-encoder/nli-distilroberta-base trained on the Stanford Natural Language Inference https://nlp.stanford.edu/projects/snli/ and Multi-Genre Natural Language Inference https://huggingface.co/datasets/multi_nli datasets. Using similar models, zero-shot classification transformers have demonstrated superior performance relative to other natural language processing models arXiv:1909.00161. All other zero-shot classification model pipelines can be implemented using their model name from https://huggingface.co/models?pipeline_tag=zero-shot- classification}.
